suspicious_pots.configuration.title: Suspicious Pots Configuration
suspicious_pots.configuration.spawning_l: A list with all the mobs that can spawn from a broken pot (probability is written in decimal. 1.0 = 100%, 0.5 = 50%, 0.03 = 3%)
suspicious_pots.configuration.blocks_whi: Only allows mobs to spawn if the pots are above a certain block. Useful if you want the mobs to only spawn in pots of certain structures. (use 'minecraft:oxidized_copper' for trial chambers)
suspicious_pots.configuration.silverfish: This is the probability that when a silverfish spawns from a broken pot, that other silverfish from nearby pots are spawning.
suspicious_pots.configuration.debug_mode: Enables the Debug Mode. (shows you the spawn values & probabilities in the server console)
